messages.body: $AAPL so Goldman Sachs was talking nonsense last week

message.body: $AAPL Wait, what?? What about all the analysts who were screaming production cuts and below expectation sales?

messages.body: $AAPL I’ll just leave this right here
$AAPL Take note that iPhone X launched on Nov. 3, 2018, so with about 8 or so shipping weeks in FQ1.

message.body: iPhone X "flopped" to the tune of around $30B in revenue FQ1, or probably around HALF of $AAPL's ENTIRE iPhone line revenue for the quarter.

messages.body: $AAPL If iPhone X "limps" to the finish line with around $45-50B in revenues for its 12-month flagship cycle...is that a "flop"?
iPhone X "flopped" to the tune of around $30B in revenue FQ1, or probably around HALF of $AAPL's ENTIRE iPhone line revenue for the quarter.
$AAPL $GOOG Not going to supplant cheap-ass Chromebooks. Apple could poop out cheap kit and take over, but that’s not how they roll.

message.body: $AAPL back to shipping educational ipads to schools, taking over $GOOG 's share. That's bullish. (but still tech gonna crash soon:)

links.description: Apple faces a fresh wave of lawsuits in the wake of its battery throttling scandal Total has now reached about 60 lawsuits and users hope to make it class action Plaintiffs allege that Apple failed to disclose the scope of its battery problems Apple is also being investigated by U.S.
